pageDescription: Room actions are actions that make it easy to create your own custom multimedia chat rooms.

comment.shortText: Attempts to get the current options for the given chat room. Useful for determining the current state of the local video (camera), audio (microphone), and screen streams. Returns a promise that resolves with an object that contains the information.
The name of the room that the options should be retrieved for.

Attempts to get the current options for the given chat room. Useful for determining the current state of the local video (camera), audio (microphone), and screen streams. Returns a promise that resolves with an object that contains the information.
Attempts to get the current options for the specified remote user in the specified room. Returns a promise that resolves with an object that contains information about the remote user.
comment.text: This function is useful for determining if the user is streaming audio or video and how good their network connection is.

comment.shortText: the name of the room.
the ID of the remote user whose options should be retrieved. Remote IDs can be obtained via the [`@onRoomRemoteJoined`](tags:@onRoomRemoteJoined) listener.
Attempts to get the current options for the specified remote user in the specified room. Returns a promise that resolves with an object that contains information about the remote user.
comment.text: This function is useful for determining if the user is streaming audio or video and how good their network connection is.

comment.shortText:
Attempts to get the current options for the specified audio/video track in the specified room.
Returns a promise that resolves with an object that contains the information.
comment.text: This function is useful for getting basic information about a track, like the video aspect ratio or if it is sourced from a camera or the screen.

comment.shortText: the name of the room.
the address of the audio/video track. Track addresses can be obtained via the [`@onRoomTrackSubscribed`](tags:@onRoomTrackSubscribed) listener.

Attempts to get the current options for the specified audio/video track in the specified room.
Returns a promise that resolves with an object that contains the information.
comment.text: This function is useful for getting basic information about a track, like the video aspect ratio or if it is sourced from a camera or the screen.

comment.shortText:
Attempts to join the given meeting room using the given options.
Returns a promise that resolves with an object that indicates whether the operation was successful.
comment.text:
Triggers the [`@onRoomJoined`](tags:@onRoomJoined) listener once the room has been successfully joined.

Additionally, the following listeners will be triggered when the relevent events occur in the chat room:
-    [`@onRoomTrackSubscribed`](tags:@onRoomTrackSubscribed)
-    [`@onRoomTrackUnsubscribed`](tags:@onRoomTrackUnsubscribed)
-    [`@onRoomStreamLost`](tags:@onRoomStreamLost)
-    [`@onRoomStreaming`](tags:@onRoomStreaming)
-    [`@onRoomSpeakersChanged`](tags:@onRoomSpeakersChanged)
-    [`@onRoomRemoteJoined`](tags:@onRoomRemoteJoined)
-    [`@onRoomRemoteLeave`](tags:@onRoomRemoteLeave)
-    [`@onRoomOptionsChanged`](tags:@onRoomOptionsChanged)

tags.text: Room actions are actions that make it easy to create your own custom multimedia chat rooms.

comment.shortText: the name of the room that should be joined. Any valid string can be used as a room name. Additionally, rooms are shared across instances.
the additional options for joining the room.

Attempts to join the given meeting room using the given options.
Returns a promise that resolves with an object that indicates whether the operation was successful.

tags.text: Room actions are actions that make it easy to create your own custom multimedia chat rooms.

comment.shortText: Attempts to exit the given room using the given options. Returns a promise that resolves with an object which indicates whether the operation was successful.
comment.text: Triggers the [`@onRoomLeave`](tags:@onRoomLeave) listener once the room has been left.

comment.shortText: the name of the room that should be exited.
the additional options for leaving the room.
Attempts to exit the given room using the given options. Returns a promise that resolves with an object which indicates whether the operation was successful.
comment.text: Triggers the {@tag @onRoomLeave} listener once the room has been left.

comment.shortText:
Attempts to set the options for the given chat room.
Useful for enabling/disabling video, audio, and screensharing. Returns a promise that resolves with an object indicating if the operation was successful and what the current state of the room is.
comment.text: Triggers the [`@onRoomOptionsChanged`](tags:@onRoomOptionsChanged) and [`@onRoomTrackSubscribed`](tags:@onRoomTrackSubscribed)/[`@onRoomTrackUnsubscribed`](tags:@onRoomTrackUnsubscribed) listeners as needed for the specified changes.

comment.shortText: the name of the room that the options should be changed in.
the options to set. Omitted properties remain unchanged.

Attempts to set the options for the given chat room.
Useful for enabling/disabling video, audio, and screensharing. Returns a promise that resolves with an object indicating if the operation was successful and what the current state of the room is.
comment.text: Triggers the {@tag @onRoomOptionsChanged} and {@tag @onRoomTrackSubscribed}/{@tag @onRoomTrackUnsubscribed} listeners as needed for the specified changes.

comment.shortText: Attempts to set the current options for the specified audio/video track in the specified room. Returns a promise that resolves with an object that indicates whether the operation was successful.
comment.text: This function is useful for locally muting a track or setting the video quality you want it to stream at.

comment.shortText: the name of the room.
the address of the audio/video track. Track addresses can be obtained via the [`@onRoomTrackSubscribed`](tags:@onRoomTrackSubscribed) listener.
the options that should be set for the track.
Attempts to set the current options for the specified audio/video track in the specified room. Returns a promise that resolves with an object that indicates whether the operation was successful.
comment.text: This function is useful for locally muting a track or setting the video quality you want it to stream at.
